Class Message

java.lang.Object
Message
public class Message extends Object
used to store information about the messages
Author:
Sam Watts, Jonah Phillipson-Masters, Harrison Reed

    • Message

      public Message(String text, Contact contact, boolean sent, int ID)
      constructor for the message class
      Parameters:
      text - - the contents of the message
      contact - - the contact the message is being sent to/from
      sent - - whether the message was sent or received
      ID - - the ID of the message

    • Message

      public Message(String text, Contact contact, boolean sent, int newHour, int newMin, int newSec, int newIsToday, int newDay, int newMonth, int newYear, int ID)
      constructor for the message class, used when loading from a file
      Parameters:
      text - - the contents of the message
      contact - - the contact the message is being sent to/from
      sent - - whether the message was sent or received
      newHour - - the hour the message was sent
      newMin - - the minute the message was sent
      newSec - - the second the message was sent
      newIsToday - - whether the message was sent today or not
      newDay - - the day the message was sent
      newMonth - - the month the message was sent
      newYear - - the year the message was sent
      ID - - the ID of the message
